scenarios.description: scenario that is unfamilar and does not match any of the other scenarios.
My roommate drank my milk again.
I missed an important deadline at work.
I can't find my keys and I'm late for an appointment.
Another driver cuts you off dangerously in traffic.
You are blamed for a mistake you did not make.
A customer starts yelling at you for no reason.
A friend breaks an important promise to you.
Someone keeps interrupting you while you are speaking.
You discover your favorite item has been stolen.
Your boss criticizes your work unfairly.
Your team ignores your contributions.
Your partner forgets an important anniversary.
Someone humiliates you in front of others.
Walking alone at night and hearing footsteps behind you.
Receiving an unexpected call from the police.
You lose sight of your child in a crowded place.
You are awaiting critical medical test results.
Hearing strange noises in your house at night.
Severe turbulence on a flight.
Your company announces sudden layoffs.
A dog runs toward you aggressively.
You learn your identity has been stolen.
You experience sudden chest pain.
You forgot your best friend’s birthday.
You lied to someone you care about.
You broke something valuable belonging to someone else.
You promised to attend an important event but forgot.
You treated someone unfairly out of impatience.
You ignored calls from a friend in crisis.
You shouted at someone in anger.
You wasted a large amount of food.
You neglected to care for your pet properly.
You saw someone needing help but did nothing.
Your friend gets promoted while you are overlooked.
Your partner keeps mentioning their ex.
Your parents favor your sibling over you.
A friend’s success makes you feel inferior.
You see your partner flirting with someone.
Someone you know posts photos with your close friends.
A classmate wins an award you wanted.
Your colleague receives all the attention.
Your friends hang out without inviting you.
Your neighbor buys an expensive new car.
A close friend moves far away.
Your pet passes away.
You go through a difficult breakup.
You lose your job unexpectedly.
You weren’t invited to an important event.
A family member falls seriously ill.
A big personal goal falls through.
You drift apart from a longtime friend.
You feel forgotten by someone you care about.
You feel unappreciated in your work.
Stuck in traffic when you are late.
Your computer crashes before saving work.
Your flight gets delayed repeatedly.
You encounter endless bureaucracy.
Someone keeps making the same mistake.
You miss an important delivery.
Your team is disorganized.
Receiving poor service in a restaurant.
A colleague’s delay causes you to miss a deadline.
Waiting in a long, slow-moving line.
You trip and fall in public.
You forget your words during a presentation.
You have a wardrobe malfunction in front of others.
You call someone by the wrong name.
Someone shares something private about you.
You send a message to the wrong person.
Your stomach growls loudly in a quiet room.
Your voice cracks while speaking.
You are asked a question you can’t answer publicly.
You are rejected in front of others.
You have a major exam tomorrow.
You have to give a big presentation soon.
Meeting with your boss to discuss performance.
Going on a first date.
Facing unexpected financial problems.
You must relocate on short notice.
You have an urgent visa issue.
Awaiting feedback on important work.
Receiving repeated calls from an unknown number.
A sudden unannounced visit from your landlord.
You are asked to follow an unfamiliar cultural custom.
You get a cryptic message that worries you.
Receiving mixed signals from someone you care about.
You enter a situation with unclear social rules.
A stranger asks you for a favor.
Waiting long for an important response.
Lost in an unfamiliar area.
You are accused of something you didn’t do.
You receive unexpected critical feedback.
You overhear plans you weren’t invited to.
Plans change at the last minute.
You forget an important password.
Your order arrives completely wrong.
Your company introduces a confusing new policy.
You overhear a conversation about you.
You are assigned too many tasks at once.
Your friend cancels plans without explanation.
You are unsure about your career direction.
Someone you texted doesn’t reply.
You realize you offended someone unintentionally.
You receive a promotion at work and your colleagues congratulate you.
Your friends surprise you with a birthday party.
You complete a long-term project successfully.
You receive a call with great news.
You help someone in need and they thank you warmly.
You reunite with a close friend after years apart.
Someone gives you a thoughtful gift.
You are about to leave for an exciting vacation.
Your doctor tells you your health is excellent.
You master a skill you've been practicing.
You spend a cozy evening with family.
A stranger compliments your style.
You wake up to a beautiful sunny morning.
You laugh together with friends until your stomach hurts.
Your hard work is publicly acknowledged.
Your presentation is well-received and praised.
You unexpectedly win a contest or raffle.
Your pet snuggles up to you.
You move into a new home and feel hopeful.
You enjoy a delicious meal at your favorite restaurant.
You find money you forgot in a jacket pocket.
You hear a baby laugh and feel joyful.
You receive a high grade on an exam you studied hard for.
The rain clears just in time for your outdoor plans.
You wake up to a kind message from a friend.
Your colleagues support your ideas in a meeting.
You recall a fond memory that makes you smile.
Someone holds the door open and wishes you a good day.
You reflect on how far you've come and feel proud.
You get the chance to attend a workshop on something you love.
You start learning a new hobby and feel curious.
You spend a rainy day reflecting on your life.
You pack up your old apartment with mixed feelings.
You are waiting for news that could be good or bad.
It's your first day at a new job and you feel a mix of nerves and excitement.
You meet new people at an event and feel curious and cautious.
You get an email from someone you haven’t heard from in years.
You try something unfamiliar and feel uncertain.
You stay up late thinking about your goals.
An appointment is cancelled and you suddenly have free time.
